title: FS: NEW 13 Card Low Grade T206 Lot w/ HOF & SL'ers
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW 13 Card Low Grade T206 Lot w/ HOF & SL'ers
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition.  These are all obviously very low grade cards and are priced accordingly.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards for easier viewing):

Casey - $8
Kelley (HOF) - $20
Will take Rockenfeld Raw and Lipe if still available - PM sent.
